reviews.review: I would. For the first 977 hours that i played this game. All was good, never had any weird frame drops, never been kicked out of a game for no reason. Then, I played last night, 06/05/2020. A few of my friends and I were enjoying our little gaming sesh, when all of a sudden. Two of them completely freeze up and have to FORCE CLOSE the game to get it to restart. Then, it was like fireworks. The enemy team kept leaving and reconnecting, same thing was happening to them. Happened to me three times in one game. I would this game, but keep that in mind.
